title: AI-Powered Portfolio Platform
description: A serverless portfolio application with AI-driven personalization, unique recruiter links, and customized prompts built on Next.js and AWS cloud services.
highlights: Cost-optimized serverless architecture with S3 static deployment and pay-per-use AWS services
AI-powered personalization using Amazon Bedrock with unique recruiter-specific links
Working AI Q&A system using Amazon Bedrock with plans to enhance the knowledge base
Invisible authentication system using Cognito virtual users for secure personalized experiences
Infrastructure as Code with AWS CDK for automated, repeatable deployments

title: Web3 Snapshot Dashboard
description: Real-time cryptocurrency market dashboard with live price tracking, tokenomics analysis, and responsive data visualization for top 100 cryptocurrencies.
highlights: Real-time data streaming with Server-Sent Events and Redis pub/sub for live market updates
Comprehensive tokenomics analysis including MC/FDV ratios and percentage change calculations
Full-stack containerized architecture with automated data fetching via cron jobs
Responsive React dashboard with interactive tables, modals, and iframe embedding support

title: Image Processor
description: Concurrent batch image processing tool with Docker containerization and CLI interface.
highlights: Batch Processing: Process multiple images concurrently using ThreadPoolExecutor for optimal performance
Multiple Filters: Support for grayscale, blur, resize, and EXIF-based rotation operations
Containerized Deployment: Complete Docker setup with development environment and CI/CD pipeline
